header.banner: Discover the beauty of Nha Trang beaches - Vietnam's coastal paradise

footer.description: Providing tourism information, transportation, cuisine and history of Nha Trang - Khanh Hoa to help you have the best trip.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to receive tourism information, promotions and latest updates about Nha Trang.
footer.copyright: Nha Trang Insight - Tourism & Lifestyle Information in Nha Trang

hero.title: Discover
hero.subtitle: Tourism information, transportation and services in the beautiful coastal paradise of Nha Trang

sections.exploreSubtitle: Useful information to help you plan your perfect trip to this beautiful coastal city

transportation.title: Transportation & Getting Around
transportation.description: Information about getting to Nha Trang and transportation within the city: taxi, bus, motorbike rental and many other options.

moto.title: Motorbike Rental
moto.description: Reliable and affordable motorbike rental service from 100,000đ - 180,000đ/day, diverse range of bikes from manual to premium scooters, delivery available in Nha Trang.

car.title: Car Rental
car.description: Self-drive or chauffeur car rental service, diverse vehicle range from 4-16 seats, reasonable prices, simple procedures, airport transfer service available.

bus.title: Nha Trang Bus
bus.description: Route information, schedules and maps of public bus routes in Nha Trang. Tickets from only 7,000 VND/trip, economical and convenient transportation.

taxi.title: Taxi Service
taxi.description: Detailed information about reputable taxi companies in Nha Trang, fares from 15,000 - 20,000đ/km, booking phone numbers and popular routes.
